titleInfo.title: The spectrum of a finite dimensional algebra
Ring theory. Proceedings of the 1978 Antwerp Conference

bibliographicCitation.angewandte-chemie: C. M. Ringel, in Ring theory. Proceedings of the 1978 Antwerp Conference (Ed.: F. Van Oystaeyen), Dekker, New York, 1979, p. 535-597.
